page.title: 15RELIGION IN OUR AREA
page.content: {MR.DONALD}HAS BEEN A{MINISTER}FOR{7.5 YEARS HE IS A MINISTER AT{BOWDEN}AS WELL AS{LILLIESLEAF}CHURCH.WHEN HE FIRST CAME,HE WAS A MINISTER AT {ASHKIRK}AS WELL.HE BECAME A MINISTER BECAUSE HE WANTED TO BE ONE. HE WENT TO{GLASGOW }UNIVERSITY FOR {3} YEARS TO STUDY{DIVINITY.}AS A MINISTER HE PREACHES ON SUNDAYS AT{BOWDEN}AND THEN AT{LILLIESLEAF.}DURING THE WEEK HE VISITS PEOPLE IN HOSPITALS AND AT THEIR HOMES.{MR.DONALD }IS INVOLVED IN MEETINGS AT THE CHURCH WITH THE TWO CONGREGATIONS AND IS ALSO A MEMBER OF SOME COMMITTEES IN EDINBURGH. HE GOES TO EDINBURGH OCCASIONALLY. A GOOD MEASURE OF THE TIME TO MAKE HIS SERVICE IS THAT ONE MINUTE OF THE SERMON NEEDS ONE HOURS PREPARATION.THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF PEOPLE THAT GO TO LILLIESLEAF CHURCH IS THIRTY FOUR AND AT BOWDEN ONE HUNDRED.
